# Codeperate UI Library

![Built With Stencil](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Built%20With%20Stencil-16161d.svg?logo=data%3Aimage%2Fsvg%2Bxml%3Bbase64%%2BCjxzdHlsZSB0eXBlPSJ0ZXh0L2NzcyI%2BCgkuc3Qwe2ZpbGw6I0ZGRkZGRjt9Cjwvc3R5bGU%%2BCg%3D%3D&colorA=16161d&style=flat-square)

### Features

- Framework agnostic! Built as web components, can be used on any framework (e.g. vue/angular/ionic etc.)
- Design for css utilities. Style the components easily with your favourite class utilities framework e.g. [tailwind](https://tailwindcss.com/ "tailwind") & [windicss](https://windicss.org/ "windicss").
- Highly customizable
- Written in typescript
- Written in latest css standard (not even flexbox, just grid)


## Getting Started
```
npm i @codeperate/ui-library
```
Import it according to [stencil documentation](https://stenciljs.com/docs/overview)
